name: Grant Haffner Fangame
description:
This game is based on paintings by Grant Haffner, it's color palette was sampled from his piece Endless Summer.

All visual effects in the game were made using the Unity Shader Graph. All game development done by me, Malcolm MacDonald.

Installation Instructions:
Download .zip and extract.

Controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to look
Backspace to reset position
Escape to exit program
